items.answer: A general rule is 10-12 times your annual income, but factors like debts, dependents, and future goals should be considered.

items.answer: Term life covers a specific period and is more affordable. Whole life provides lifetime coverage with a cash value component.

items.answer: Yes, many carriers offer coverage for various health conditions. We'll help you find the right fit for your situation.

items.name: David Chen
items.text: Windshield replacement at my office parking lot. They came to me, installed OEM glass, and recalibrated ADAS. Couldn't be easier.

items.name: Jennifer Mitchell
items.text: Rock chip repair saved my windshield from cracking further. They filled it perfectly and you can barely see where it was.

items.name: Robert Adams
items.text: Side window replacement after a break-in was done same day. They even cleaned up all the broken glass from inside the car.

items.name: Laura Turner
items.text: Insurance claim handled directly with my provider. Zero out of pocket and the quality is perfect. Smooth process from start to finish.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.body: Kanjona ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.body: We collect information that you provide directly to us, as well as information collected automatically when you use our services.

automatic.title: Information Collected Automatically
automatic.browser: Browser type, device information, and operating system
automatic.usage: Pages visited, time spent, and referring URLs

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.matching: Matching you with qualified service providers in your area
use.delivery: Delivering the services you have requested
use.communication: Communicating with you about your requests and our services
use.improvement: Improving our website, services, and user experience
use.legal: Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.body: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
sharing.providers: With vetted service providers to fulfill your service request
sharing.legal: When required by law, regulation, or legal process
sharing.noSale: We never sell your personal data to third-party advertisers or data brokers

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.body: We retain your personal information for up to 90 days in our active systems for lead matching purposes. After this period, data is archived and retained only as required by law or for legitimate business purposes. You may request deletion of your data at any time.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.access: Right to access and receive a copy of your personal data
rights.correction: Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete information
rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of your personal data
rights.optOut: Right to opt out of marketing communications at any time

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.body: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and understand where our visitors come from. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Essential cookies are required for the site to function properly, while analytics cookies help us improve our services.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By accessing or using Kanjona's website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access the service.

description.title: Service Description
description.body: Kanjona provides a lead generation platform that connects consumers seeking home services, professional services, and other service categories with qualified service providers. We facilitate introductions between consumers and providers but do not perform the services ourselves.

obligations.title: User Obligations
obligations.body: When using our services, you agree to:
obligations.accurate: Provide accurate, current, and complete information in all forms
obligations.lawful: Use our services only for lawful purposes
obligations.noAbuse: Not misuse, spam, or abuse our platform or services
obligations.noAutomate: Not use automated systems to access the service without our express permission

privacySection.title: Privacy
privacySection.body: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Kanjona shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.body: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Kanjona and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses arising from your use of the services or violation of these terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.body: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our services at any time, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason at our sole discretion.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.body: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved in the courts of competent jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.body: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Your continued use of the services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing, you agree to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
